info.author: Iñigo Serna
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Affero General Public License v3 or later (AGPLv3+)
info.description:
Bookmarks is a simple personal web-based application to manage web bookmarks.
It was coded as a funny practice, but it includes some nice features: advanced search, tags cloud, years cloud.
It's written in Python 3 and uses BottlePy web microframework and jQuery javascript library. Both are included with the package.
I think this little application can be useful for anyone learning
Python web programming.
info.license: GNU Affero GPL v3 or later

info.html_description: Bookmarks is a simple personal web-based application to manage web bookmarks. It was coded as a funny practice, but it includes some nice features: advanced search, tags cloud, years cloud. It’s written in Python 3 and uses BottlePy web microframework and jQuery javascript library. Both are included with the package. I think this little application can be useful for anyone learning Python web programming.
